column1:
RewriteEngine On  
    RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f  
    RewriteRule ^([^/]+)/$ $1.php  
    RewriteRule ^([^/]+)/([^/]+)/$ /$1/$2.php  
    RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-f  
    RewriteCond %{REQUEST_FILENAME} !-d  
    RewriteCond %{REQUEST_URI} !(\.[a-zA-Z0-9]{1,5}|/)$  
    RewriteRule (.*)$ /$1/ [R=301,L]
